customProperties.armorEffects: Armor has its weight multiplied by 1.5x. Crafting Armor besides Titanic Platemail or greater requires half the plates (rounded up).
customProperties.weaponEffects: Attacking a creature concentrating on a spell gives them disadvantage on the saving throw to maintain concentration.
customProperties.additionalEffects: Material for +1 Smith's, Jeweler's, Cook's, Carpenter's, or Thieves' Tools (2 Plates). Can be used to make Titanic Platemail (10 Plates)

entries.name: Properties
entries: Forging Conditions: Uncommon or Better Smith's Tools
Armor Effects: Armor has its weight multiplied by 1.5x. Crafting Armor besides Titanic Platemail or greater requires half the plates (rounded up).
Weapon Effects: Attacking a creature concentrating on a spell gives them disadvantage on the saving throw to maintain concentration.
Additional Effects: Material for +1 Smith's, Jeweler's, Cook's, Carpenter's, or Thieves' Tools (2 Plates). Can be used to make Titanic Platemail (10 Plates)
